name: Kal'adra
loreDescription: A cursed weapon created by the fallen priest, Sestia. It causes a mental breakdown in the target by reminding them of their most painful memories. Even ages later, when fallen priests have sided with the Covenant, use of this mask is banned.

skillDescription.base: If the enemy is debuffed, damage dealt increases by 15.0%.
skillDescription.max: If the enemy is debuffed, damage dealt increases by 30.0%.
